name: Shani Dosha
desc: Shani Dosha occurs when Saturn is weak, ill placed or retrograded in the birth chart. Shani Dosha effects the native both externally and internally creating variety of problems and distrubances
remedies:
Making donations and charities on Saturdays
Wear Blue Shappire or Amethyst or Horse Shoe Ring
Chant Shani Mantra, Hanuman Chalisa, Mrutyunjaya Manatra and Navagraha Mantra
Help Poor & Needy People
Donating things like black seasame seeds, Urad Dal, Mustard Oil, Black Clothes, Articles made of iron or clay especially on Saturdays
